item.description: Over on the new RStudio Community site1, a useful thread arose re. asking questions â“ on this new site vs. Stack Overflow: Choosing between this site and StackOverflow for posting a question. I wonâ€™t bother trying to recap the nuances of the discussion here (since you can go read it directly; see ğŸ”— above), but I wanted to stash a bit of info here from one of my responses that might be helpful to new coders and/or users of Stack Overflow (SO).
